title: Add message edit and delete features, rename app to Alatele

requirements.summary: Update the application name from 'Alatele2' to 'Alatele' in the Header component and all UI-facing locations
acceptanceCriteria: All user-visible references to the app name are updated to 'Alatele'

file_operations.description: Change the app title text from 'Alatele2' to 'Alatele' in the header component

requirements.summary: Add a delete button to each message that allows users to delete their own messages
acceptanceCriteria: A delete button appears on messages sent by the current user
Clicking the delete button removes the message from the message list
The message is permanently deleted from backend storage
Other users cannot see deleted messages after refresh
Users cannot delete messages sent by other users

file_operations.description: Add a delete button that appears only on messages sent by the current user. The button should call the useDeleteMessage hook with the message ID. Only show the delete button when the message sender matches the current username prop.

Add a useDeleteMessage mutation hook that calls the backend deleteMessage function with the message ID and invalidates the messages query cache on success. Handle loading and error states appropriately.

requirements.summary: Add an edit button to each message that allows users to edit their own messages
acceptanceCriteria: An edit button appears on messages sent by the current user
Clicking the edit button enables inline editing of the message content
Users can save the edited message or cancel the edit
The edited message is updated in backend storage
Other users see the updated message content after refresh
Users cannot edit messages sent by other users

file_operations.description: Add an edit button that appears only on messages sent by the current user. Clicking the edit button should toggle inline editing mode for that message, showing a textarea with the current content and save/cancel buttons. The save button should call the useEditMessage hook with the message ID and new content. Only show the edit button when the message sender matches the current username prop.

Add a useEditMessage mutation hook that calls the backend editMessage function with the message ID and new content, and invalidates the messages query cache on success. Handle loading and error states appropriately.

requirements.summary: Create React Query hooks for delete and edit message operations with automatic cache invalidation
acceptanceCriteria: A useDeleteMessage hook calls the backend delete function and invalidates the messages query
A useEditMessage hook calls the backend edit function and invalidates the messages query
Both hooks handle loading and error states appropriately
The message list refreshes automatically after successful operations

file_operations.description: Export useDeleteMessage and useEditMessage mutation hooks using React Query's useMutation. Both hooks should use the backend actor from useActor, call the respective backend functions (deleteMessage and editMessage), and invalidate the 'messages' query key on success to trigger automatic refetch. Include proper error handling and loading states.
